author: Emirates247
title: Janet Jackson, Qatari husband Wissam Al Mana take front row | International
text:
Stepping out in style!
Janet Jackson may be traveling around the world in honor of her Unbreakable Tour. A busy schedule, however, wouldn't stop the "All for You" crooner from stopping by Paris Fashion Week for a special show.
In a rare public appearance together, Jackson joined husband Wissam Al Mana in the front row for Hermes' 2016 Spring/Summer show.
The superstar performer kept things comfortable thanks to a black turtleneck with matching pants and sunglasses. Meanwhile, her main man opted for a black blazer, trousers and loafers.
Aymeline Valade, Carine Roitfeld, Janet Jackson and husband Wissam Al Mana attend Hermes 2016 Spring/Summer ready-to-wear collection fashion show. (AFP)
Janet Jackson and her husband Wissam Al Mana. (Reuters)
Janet Jackson, 49, and her husband Wissam Al Mana, 40, put on a cosy display as they sat front row at the Hermes SS16 show. (AFP)
